parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the current fade factor of control.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Number]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''ctrlFade''' controlName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> controlName: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>_scale = ctrlFade _control</inner><close></pre></close></ext>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlSetFade]]
</value></part></template>
